title: Need an On-The-Go Breakfast? Try Egg White Bites
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Mornings have a tendency to feel rushed. For those who have to get out the door early and quickly each day, breakfast is oftentimes an afterthought. But it doesn’t have to be this way – there are on-the-go recipes that are designed to make your breakfast routine simple, so you don’t miss out on the most important meal of the day. Thinking about testing this out for yourself? We recommend you try this on-the-go egg white bites recipe. Filled with nutritious and delicious ingredients, we at Chino Valley Ranchers are sure that you will love it. Take a look at the full recipe below!

What You’ll Need:

  • Chino Valley Ranchers’ liquid egg whites
  • Black pepper
  • Diced bell pepper
  • Spinach
  • Diced white onion
  • Cooking spray

1. Prep your area.

Start by preheating your oven to 350°. Then, take out a regular- or miniature-sized muffin pan and spray each cup with cooking spray.

2. Get the vegetables ready.

Tear spinach leaves into small pieces and place them on the bottom of each cup. They will serve as the base of the bites. Then, dice some bell peppers and white onions and sprinkle them into the cups. Feel free to add bacon if you’d like. Fill the cups up to about halfway with these ingredients.

3. Add the liquid egg whites.

Pour your Chino Valley Ranchers liquid egg whites into each cup so that they are all filled to the very top. For some extra seasoning, add black pepper.

4. Time to bake. 

With your muffin cups filled, place the pan into the oven for about 10-12 minutes. When they are cooked, take them out and let them cool.

You now have your week’s breakfast meals all planned in advanced! Remove the bites from the muffin cups and place them in Tupperware and you are on your way to make your mornings so much easier!

To make this recipe taste its best, be sure to use Chino Valley Ranchers’ liquid egg whites. Not only are they nutritious, but they also taste great, too! For more information on our products, contact us today.
